snippet: A report released Tuesday found a catalog of police failures that allowed Jimmy Savile, a television personality, to avoid investigation for a lifetime of sex offenses.
abstract: Police oversight agency issues report showing that police failures over five years allowed British television personality Jimmy Savile to escape investigation for lifetime of sex offenses dating to early 1960s.
lead_paragraph: A report released Tuesday found a catalog of police failures that allowed Jimmy Savile, a television personality, to avoid investigation for a lifetime of sex offenses.

headline.seo: British Report Says Police Failed to Pursue Savile Sex Charges
headline.main: British Oversight Unit Says Police Failed to Pursue Sex Accusations Against Savile
headline.print_headline: British Oversight Unit Says Police Failed to Pursue Sex Accusations Against Savile
